resources.string:
In a "Time Solo Deck" game of FindDaMatch, you are to discard a deck of cards as quickly as possible by finding matching icons between two cards at a time.

 The game begins by separating one random card as the top of the discard pile, leaving the rest in the draw pile.

 You are to spot any matching symbol between the card at the top of the discard pile and the current top card in the draw pile by tapping on said symbol.
 If correct, the draw pile's top card will become the new top card in the discard and you'll have to keep picking until all cards go to the discard pile. 

You're timed, so check quickly!
(You can scroll through the help description above!)

CMPT 276 Summer 2020 Project (Iteration 1) By Group Eleven:
Benjamin Howard
William Horvath
Yuyang Li
Michael Mora
An image for the first button in the draw pile.
An image for the second button in the draw pile.
An image for the third button in the draw pile.
An image for the first button in the discard pile.
An image for the second button in the discard pile.
An image for the third button in the discard pile.
A tag for the button to know which pile it is in.
